item.title: VFC
item.description: score:36 Chances: The global clothing industry has faced challenges in 2023 including high inflation and greater scrutiny over manufacturing processes. Cooler weather and the eventfulness it brings may impact investor sentiment, but evidence suggests that cooler temperatures offer better market returns than the summer season.
